channel.title: Server rune error [delta] 317
channel.description:
hey.. I got this when I ran my sever.
[i]Loading npcs... drops... spawn list...done! com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure due to underlying exception:
** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **
java.net.ConnectException MESSAGE: Connection refused: connect
STACKTRACE:
java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method) at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.java:173) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:267) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2739) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java:266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at SQL.createConnection(SQL.java:14) at server.run(server.java:255) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
Last packet sent to the server was 31 ms ago. at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2814) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java:266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at SQL.createConnection(SQL.java:14) at server.run(server.java:255) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Server is already in use. [/i]

item.title: Server rune error [delta] 317
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Aeonscape:

hi , have you edited any npc drop or npc spawns the code might be out line with what it should be.

…That has nothing to do with it.

This means that the server is trying to connect to a SQL database, but cannot. Go into server.java and check to see if it’s trying to connect to SQL. If you don’t know what to look for, paste your server.java here.

Read full topic

@DaGleesh wrote:

hey… I got this when I ran my sever.

[i]Loading npcs… drops… spawn list…done!
com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure due to underlying exception:
